name:
Calamari
 Network
shortDescription: Calamari Network is the plug-and-play privacy-preservation protocol built to service the entire DeFi stack on Kusama (and Manta Network on Polkadot).
description: Built on Substrate to leverage interoperability and zkSNARKs to leverage scalable privacy, Calamari Network offers a suite of products and services that enable privacy for blockchain projects. As part of its own suite of products, Calamari Network offers private payment and a private decentralized exchange, MantaSwap. Mantaâ€™s founding team comprises many US cryptocurrency veterans, professors, and scholars whose experience include Harvard, MIT, and Algorand.
